episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

A new restaurant just opened—do you want to try
it out sometime?
(Say of course.)
Great! What a fantastic answer!
(Ask more about the restaurant.)

I heard that it has a trendy atmosphere, and that
it’s already gotten really popular.
There’s just one condition to get in...

Apparently, they won’t let you in unless both the
Trainer and Pokémon are approved as
having “style.”

*chuckle* I know it sounds a little intimidating,
but don’t worry!

I do have some understanding of how to
be stylish.

There’s a similar restaurant in Kalos, and I did my
best to get in.

First, looking put-together is key when it comes
to style.

Us Trainers have it easy—we just need to make
sure our clothes and hair look good.

But our Pokémon need a little more work. I’ll
teach you!

Just leave it to me! I have experience trimming
Furfrou’s fur.

I’ve been styling my partner Pokémon’s fur on
Pasio too, and I’ve brushed up on my skills!

(Say you’re surprised by his
unexpected talent.)
Heh! Unexpected, huh?
(Praise Calem for his dedication.)

I just did it because I like it—it’s really not a
big deal.
As for the Trainer...

No need to worry! You look great the way
you are.
I still want to go over everything, though...

It’s not just about our appearance—we need
to have our manners down to a T, too!

With that said, let’s check our appearance and go
over how to to act stylish!

Don’t worry. I have your back if you get stumped
on something.
All right, let’s head inside.
Are you nervous? I kind of am too, actually.

The two of them successfully got into the
restaurant and enjoyed an extravagant meal.

It was a great restaurant, just like the
reviews said.

Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I had a lot
of fun.

Not only did I enjoy the time we spent together at
the restaurant...

but I also enjoyed the time we spent brushing up
on our style.
(Thank him.)
*chuckle* You’re welcome!

(Smile and say you had a
great time, too.)
*chuckle* Glad to hear that!

Come to think of it, I’ve always spent a lot of time
with my friends.

But lately, I feel like I’ve been more proactive
about inviting people to hang out.

I saw that you have so many friends,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

Maybe that made me want to spend more time
with my friends, too.

When you spend time with friends, you might
sometimes argue or encounter tough situations.

But you can also share fun memories like we
did today.

Maybe that’s what friendship is all about—
wanting to know the other person better!
(Agree with Calem.)

I knew you’d feel the same,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
(Think about it for a bit.)
To each their own, I guess!
I believe there’s nothing more valuable...

than having friends you can share fun and happy
moments with.

So from now on, I hope we can continue to have
an amazing time together on Pasio...
just like we have so far!
